sentences.sContent: Closure of the plant means 80 workers are facing unemployment.
sentences.sCn: 这家工厂的关闭意味着 80 个工人面临失业。

sentences.sContent: a town where there is high unemployment
...How does unemployment insurance help the unemployed...
...Experts who monitor unemployment statistics here in Bucks County...
...but it's actually foolish: our unemployment crisis could be cured very quickly if we had the intellectual clarity and political will to act...
...all the facts suggest that high unemployment in America is the result of inadequate demand...
...But Pennsylvania State Representative Scott Petri says governments simply do not have enough money to extend unemployment insurance...
...Rosen bought groceries and made house payments with the help from unemployment insurance...
...while pessimists complain that we will experience the greatest unemployment crisis in human history...

trans.tranOther: when someone does not have a job
